title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
NOTE: On the AP Exam, to earn a point for a rubric row, responses will need to meet all criteria for that row.

Points earned:

+1 [Skill 3.A] The video demonstrates the running of the program, including output.

Do NOT award a point if:

‚óè the video does not show a demonstration of the program running (screenshots or storyboards are not acceptable and would not be credited.)

+1 [Skill 3.A] The response identifies the output of the program demonstrated in the video.
descriptions:
